traits.positive: Intelligent, adaptable, quick-witted, charming, artistic, sociable.
Strong, reliable, patient, determined, methodical, calm.
traits.negative: Stubborn, inflexible, overly cautious, materialistic, slow to change.

traits.positive: Brave, confident, competitive, unpredictable, ambitious, dynamic.
Gentle, quiet, elegant, alert, kind, responsible.
traits.negative: Indecisive, timid, overly cautious, superficial, shy.

traits.positive: Confident, charismatic, energetic, intelligent, ambitious, fearless.
Wise, mysterious, intuitive, graceful, analytical, charming.
Energetic, active, independent, intelligent, adventurous, outgoing.
traits.negative: Impatient, hot-tempered, selfish, overly confident, restless.

traits.positive: Creative, compassionate, gentle, calm, artistic, sincere.
Witty, intelligent, curious, playful, sociable, innovative.
Hardworking, confident, punctual, honest, ambitious, organized.
Loyal, honest, kind, cautious, responsible, protective.

traits.positive: Generous, compassionate, diligent, good-hearted, peaceful, trustworthy.
